description: Ask your pre-season Sheffield United questions to BBC Sport
title: Ask your pre-season Sheffield United questions
title_page: Ask your pre-season Sheffield United questions to BBC Sport - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Sheffield United in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
Our BBC Radio Sheffield expert Rob Staton is on hand to give his thoughts about all the goings-on at Bramall Lane if you send in some questions.
